body:
Comment 5: 
Okay, everything to reproduce wasn't quite there.

It seems you need two package files and maybe two anonymous unions.

GOARCH=amd64 cgo -- bork.go bork2.go

produces:

inconsistent definitions for C type _Ctype_union___0

verbs.h reduced from libibverbs.
Attachments: 1. bork.go (94 bytes) 1. bork2.go (102 bytes) 1. verbs.h (175 bytes)
